name: TheFootballfacts
0:
”Alexa, open the football facts”
”tell me some football facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the football facts
des: Football is the world’s most popular game which combines strength, speed, and skills. Even if you are a hardcore fan of Football, there may still be many things that you don’t know about this amazing sport. Check out these interesting facts about football !
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
